= Changelog

Per-release changes to google_custom_search.

== 0.3.1 (2011 May 12)

* Fix: prevent error when no description in search results (thanks github.com/mlineen).
* Allow default params to be configured in initializer via GOOGLE_SEARCH_PARAMS hash (thanks github.com/dpeckham). 

== 0.3.0 (2009 Oct 14)

* First release.
